settings.question: How long will my order take to arrive?
settings.answer:
We ship all orders from London via Royal Mail Tracked 48.

• Processing Time: 1 business day (we pack it)
• Delivery Time: 2-3 business days

You will receive a tracking number via email as soon as your order is dispatched.

settings.question: Do you offer Next Day Delivery?
settings.answer: Currently, we prioritize reliability over speed. Our standard Royal Mail Tracked 48 service is free on orders over £50 and very reliable. If you need it urgently, please email us before ordering.

settings.question: Where do you ship from?
settings.answer: All orders are packed and shipped from our facility in the UK. No long waits from overseas.

settings.question: Will the jewelry turn my skin green?
settings.answer:
No. We use 316L Surgical Grade Stainless Steel.

Unlike cheap alloy jewelry that rusts, our pieces are hypoallergenic, lead-free, and nickel-free. It is safe for sensitive skin.

settings.question: Is it waterproof?
settings.answer: Yes. Our Gold finish is applied using PVD (Physical Vapor Deposition) technology, which bonds to the steel at a molecular level. You can wear it in the shower or gym without worrying about fading or tarnishing.

settings.question: Does it come with a box?
settings.answer: Yes. Every necklace comes in a premium soft-touch jewelry box, ready for gifting. The emotional message card shown in the photos is included inside the box.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer:
We offer a 30-Day Happiness Guarantee.

If she doesn't love it, or if you change your mind, simply contact us within 30 days of receiving your order for a full refund.

Note: The item must be unworn and in its original packaging.

settings.question: How do I start a return?
settings.answer: Please email our support team at support@aurea.co.uk with your Order #, and we will send you the return instructions.

settings.question: Do you offer a warranty?
settings.answer: Yes. We stand by our craftsmanship. If your item breaks or tarnishes within 1 year of purchase, we will replace it for free.

settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.subheading: Find answers to common questions about orders, shipping, and our products.
settings.cta_text: Our customer support team replies within hours, not days.
